name: iDeators Technologies
description:
iDeators is an Mumbai,India based agency that develops customized solutions for web and mobile platforms. iDeators offers premium creative, digital services, web, mobile development, Artificial Intellegence and consulting services. Our client list includes Burger King India, Indiabulls Real Estate, Efundbook.com, i4t and many others. We encompass almost every part of development cycle start from ideation of the App till App Maintenance.
Even if we partner with an Enterprise or a start-up , our collaborative software development approach with our Agile Team helps to produce great Mobility Solutions.
